entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
